page.title: 11Edinburgh Festival
page.content: The Edinburgh Festival{events}take place all over Edinburgh in theatres, halls or outside. There will be over 1000 shows and some breakdance etc.In 1985 there were more theatres than anything else.The performers come from Africa,S. and N.America, and from all over Europe. People come from all over the world for the{entertainment} supplied in the festival or fringe, especially Americans because the dollar beats the pound and they get more value for their money. In the Eighties{politics}are playing a big part in the future of the Festival.The District Council threaten to cut the grant unless more attention is paid to catering for the{recreation of the citizens.They want events to be put on away from the city centre,things which ordinary people will enjoy.
